mapper.select: SELECT ssa.*,ssav.id vid,ssav.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr ssa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id WHERE ssa.spu_id = #{spuId}

SELECT ssa.*,ssav.id vid,ssav.sale_attr_value_name, IF(skav.id is null,"0","1") is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr ssa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value skav on ssav.id = skav.sale_attr_value_id and skav.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY ssa.base_sale_attr_id,ssav.id
